skills.content: Full Stack developer with 5 years experience. 12+ released titles.
Credited with producing detailed content during post-production. Routinely achieved industry broadcast specifications and passed QA requirements.
Developed audio solutions for projects using different technologies. Proven ability to develop, maintain and manage long-term objectives.

folio.content: A real-time interactive VR story based on a man who was lost and forgotten for twelve years in a mental asylum and how the search to find his true identity brought hope to a nation in mourning.
50+ sound department credits for involvement with commercial, television and film productions of known brands, several received global broadcast and awards.

Full-stack developer with a passion for immersive technology. Responsible for releasing 14+ cross-platform consumer titles (iOS/Android/Oculus/Web). Developed data-driven white label frameworks, consumer analytical models, audio systems, and user-friendly UI systems. My back-end experience includes developing and deploying in-house APIs, analytics, and query servers to manage user authentication and content delivery.

biography.name: Leon East
biography.content: I'm a gamer at heart, software developer, designer, and an award-winning audio engineer. I'm responsible for the development and deployment of 14+ cross-platform consumer titles. I embrace data-driven design principles, empowered collaborative teams, and human-centered design processes to create products that improve lives and help the planet.
